title: Local SEO - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Miriam Ellis April 8, 2019 How to Find Your True Local Competitors Local SEO | Search Engines | Competitive Research Who are your clients’ true competitors if every SERP is a local SERP these days? We'll help you answer that question. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis March 19, 2019 5 Google Business Profile Tweaks To Improve Foot Traffic Local SEO | Search Engines | Branding Leverage these 5 Google Business Profile tips to increase your client's foot traffic. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis February 28, 2019 Affordable, Stat-Based Retail Strategy for Your Agency's Clients Local SEO | Branding | Digital Marketing Agencies Retail clients are battling tough economics offline and tough competitors online and need every bit of help your agency can give them. Read this post By: Ben Fisher February 12, 2019 Do Businesses Really Use Google My Business Posts? A Case Study Local SEO Are Google My Business Posts worth the effort, and are actual business owners taking the time to make them? Ben Fisher reveals the findings from his study of over 2,000 GMB profiles and offers some enlightening statistics around how Posts are used and whether searchers engage. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis January 29, 2019 B2B Local Search Marketing: A Guide to Hidden Opportunity Local SEO Can local B2B businesses also benefit from local SEO? From outreach to site content to essential best practices, find out how to take advantage of your B2B advantage in local. Read this post By: Roger MozBot January 17, 2019 How to Implement a National Tracking Strategy Local SEO | Advanced SEO | Keyword Research When every SERP is hyper-localized, how do you execute a national tracking strategy? We've got a trick to help you statistically sample SERPs as if they were people. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis January 7, 2019 Taking Local Inventory Online: An Interview with Pointy’s Mark Cummins Local SEO | Search Engines | E-Commerce SEO Getting inventory online and competing with e-commerce giants is a huge obstacle for local retailers. In this interview with former Googler Mark Cummins, we explore the workings of a new option that takes advantage of the See What's In Store feature to gain a competitive edge. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis December 12, 2018 Why Local Businesses Will Need Websites More than Ever in 2019 Local SEO | Search Engines | Link Building Even as Google makes itself the new "homepage" for local, it's becoming more and more important for local businesses to maintain a website. Learn how and why it's integral to put effort into both local and organic in 2019. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis December 6, 2018 The Guide to Building Linked Unstructured Citations for Local SEO Link Building | Local SEO Linked unstructured citations are only growing in importance when it comes to local SEO. But what's the best way to build them? In this comprehensive guide to local link building, we share how in 9 steps (and the risks to avoid, as well). Read this post By: Darren Shaw November 30, 2018 Local Search Ranking Factors 2018: Local Today, Key Takeaways, and the Future Local SEO | Whiteboard Friday Local SEO has gone through much change this year. In this Whiteboard Friday, Darren Shaw explains what local is like today, dives into the key takeaways from his 2018 Local Search Ranking Factors survey, and offers us an expert's glimpse into the future. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis November 28, 2018 The State of Local SEO: Industry Insights for a Successful 2019 Local SEO Get a sense for how practitioners of local marketing are working, what struggles they're facing, and where we're seeing opportunity (read: link building!) in our new industry report, the State of Local SEO. Read this post By: Darren Shaw November 20, 2018 Announcing the 2018 Local Search Ranking Factors Survey Local SEO The 2018 Local Search Ranking Factors survey is in! See what the top experts in the field of local SEO have to say about what's affecting rankings most and where you should focus your efforts in the coming year. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis November 19, 2018 3 Empowering Small Business Tips for Today, 2019, and a Better Future Local SEO Local business is big business. In honor of Small Business Saturday, check out our best advice for empowering businesses with local SEO and excellence in the community. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis November 5, 2018 What the Local Customer Service Ecosystem Looks Like in 2019 Local SEO Excellent customer service is baked into every aspect of your local search strategy. For success in 2019, learn how to market a local business with the customer in mind at every point, from GMB to link building to in-store training. Read this post
